question: Are there any known leaks in your pipes or plumbing fixtures?

Does your house have at least one toilet, sink, and bathtub or shower?
Is your bathroom inside your unit? Or if there are two units, each not with more than two rooms, is there a bathroom that is accessible without having to go through the other unit or outside?

Is there working ventilation? This may include an electric fan or a window that opens.
Are all of the appliances and equipment provided by the landlord installed and working?
